nodes.text: Chitin carbines were living weapons used by the Yuuzhan Vong. They appeared as long tubes that held a carbine on the other end which was used to fire Nang hul at high speed targets and were capable of injuring or damaging objects. Anakin Solo suffered a hit from the chitin carbine on Yavin 4 when the planet was claimed by the Yuuzhan Vong empire.
